revised_title: Exploring Unclassified Mechanical Properties of Solids and Liquids
tldr: The author investigates the unclassified mechanical properties of solids and liquids, focusing on shear and volume limits, and their relation to the behavior of materials under stress. The study aims to explain various qualities of materials, such as hardness, softness, and surface properties, by examining their measurable constants and the forces acting upon them.
